DOC.criteria: Patients give write informed consent . Male female , aged 1875 year . Postoperative CABG pump pump ICU . Patients need fluid resuscitation . Combined operation . Need intra aortic balloon pump ( IABP ) . Patients severe arrhythmia ( VT , AF rapid response , heart block ) . Severe hemodynamic imbalance . Severe bleed and/or reoperation . Liver dysfunction ( SGOT SGPT 2x normal ) . Renal failure ( Creatinine > 2 mg % ) .
